articles.title: EVOS Esports introduces NFT gaming in Indonesia with Avarik Saga - Marketing Interactive
articles.description: The partnership aims to introduce blockchain technology, as well as help accelerate the adoption of NFT gaming, in the Indonesian market and other Southeast Asian markets.
